file_content.text: Mission status: Complete. Core shutdown commencing.
The Ulgo defenses have been eliminated. Their stronghold will be in the Empire's hands soon.
I have succeeded where you failed. The Ulgo defenses have been dealt with.
This unit offers its gratitude to the Sith Lord.
Got rid of your Ulgo problem.
The bounty hunter has completed the mission objective. This unit is grateful.
The Ulgo threat has been handled. The Empire should be able to take the stronghold soon enough.
This unit expresses its thanks to the Imperial.
Current status: Relieved. Offline units have been avenged.
Commencing core shutdown.
Current status: Bitter. Destroy Ulgo defenses!
Current status: Enraged. Systems destabilizing. Mission objective: Incomplete.
All supporting units are offline. Failure is not within mission parameters.
This unit requests assistance.
Start talking.
Complying: This unit was one of several special forces assault droids.
What assistance?
This unit is unable to complete its mission.
What is "this unit"?
This unit is a special forces assault droid with advanced infiltration protocols.
Mission parameters: Eliminate Ulgo stronghold defenses. Current mission status: Impossible. Extensive damage to this unit requires core shutdown.
All supporting units have been destroyed. Requesting assistance.
How badly do we need that Ulgo stronghold taken?
What's the priority?
This is a multi-phased assault; if this unit's mission fails, Thul and Imperial military losses will be severe.
Revenge is my specialty.
Elimination of Ulgo defenses allows stronghold to be secured by Imperial allies. Slaughter of Ulgo also avenges this unit and all offline units.
No. [Refuse quest]
Systems failing.
Current status: Systems destabilizing. Core shutdown imminent.
